Sorry to interrupt your Thanksgiving / Black Friday weekend, but we thought you might be interested in a few things we have to say...
Amazon Fire TV (top Kodi device) on Sale for $74.99 USD: [B][COLOR white]https://www.tvaddons.ag/blackfriday/[/COLOR][/B] Install Kodi for Friends in Minutes (Custom Kodi Version): [B][COLOR white]https://www.tvaddons.ag/freetelly-launch/[/COLOR][/B]
Lastly, if you're feeling generous after all that turkey and feel like donating to help cover web site expenses, anything is appreciated: [B][COLOR white]https://www.tvaddons.ag/donate/[/COLOR][/B]
